/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. Dominating the left side of the frame is a large archway, painted in vibrant shades of red and yellow. The Chinese characters "中国" are prominently displayed on it, signifying "China" in English. 

The archway is nestled amidst lush green trees and shrubs, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. On the right side of the image, modern buildings rise, their glass facades reflecting the clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly in the top right corner of the image, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. The image beautifully encapsulates the blend of tradition and modernity that characterizes Beijing.
